note_content: Richard comes to us with 13 years in the financial services firm. He has been with Morgan Stanley for the last 2.5 years and is now feeling stagnant and looking for growth. Along with this, their compensation plan has changed. Richard has served as the point of contact for new clients, converted new leads, scheduled discovery calls, written plans/delivered plans. Strong sales and closing skills. He looks to obtain his CFP, skills, and knowledge. Richard's book of business, just this year is about 27M with about 100 clients (non-transferable). He prefers to work with leadership that will help him build knowledge, advance his career, and support him.

crm[user#6221978000100225032#898434912]crm Really like him! Has Eric mentioned any leadership experience in sales? He only has 2 yeras of exp. from what I see. If you can get this answered, I am happy to submit him!
